meanings.definition: A type of footwear that covers the foot and ankle, typically made of rubber or leather.
meanings.sent1: My new shoepacs kept my feet dry in the rain.
meanings.sent2: She bought a pair of shoepacs for hiking.
meanings.sent3: The colorful shoepacs made him look like a superhero.
meanings.sent4: Her shoepacs were like shields protecting her feet.
meanings.sent5: The squeaky sound of the shoepacs echoed in the hallway.

meanings.definition: To wear or put on shoepacs.
meanings.sent1: I shoepacs before going out in the snow.
meanings.sent2: He shoepacs every time it rains.
meanings.sent3: She shoepacs like a pro, never getting her socks wet.
meanings.sent4: They shoepacs swiftly, ready for any adventure.
meanings.sent5: Shoepacing carefully, he avoided the puddles on the path.

meanings.sent1: His shoepacs were neatly placed by the door.
meanings.sent2: She lost one of her favorite shoepacs on the trip.
meanings.sent3: The shoepacs sat patiently waiting for their next adventure.
meanings.sent4: The shoepacs stood out among the other shoes in the closet.
meanings.sent5: In the lost and found, a lonely shoepacs waited to be reunited.
